[Link to dataset](https://stardewvalleywiki.com/Stardew_Valley_Wiki)

Things you plan to investigate using this dataset:

-   What season's crops yield the highest average health and energy values?
-   What fish is the hardest to catch in terms of rarity?
-   Which monsters that could be found on level 20 of the Mines is hardest to kill?

Stat 351 topics you plan to cover during the analysis:

1.  Scrapping data from the website and formatting it into a table
2.  List processing
3.  Data cleaning and using tidyverse
4.  Visualization/graphics of data findings
5.  Shiny app incorporation
